recipesJson.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Boomdog07
recipesJson.description: Uh, Strawberry cheesecake with a little extra I guess. I needed a little more substance with my previous attempts so I changed some of the Strawberries, added the whipped cream and it definitely helped. I have a problem with Straw Ripe so this was getting on my nerves, the sweet really helps!
